TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SessionChangeDescription extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Identifies the reason for a Terminal Services session change.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare to the current structure.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current session change description.
Docs.returns: if is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The return value is `false` if `obj` is not a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> or if it is `null`. Equality is determined by comparing the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the specified <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure to the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the current <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure. The two structures are considered equal if their properties are equal.

Docs.summary: Gets a hash code for the current session change description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The returned hash code is calculated from the values of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties. The hash code should not be used to compare <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> instances.
